ai_description: Extinction Sigil Tattoo removes automatic hostility for any natural enemies of lizard-class creatures. Warning: holding this Extinction Sigil will cause lizard-class enemies to deal 20% more damage against you. Any Wall Monitors will deal 150% more damage against you. You may only hide this tattoo with a cover-up sleeve.
description: |title= |image=File:Carl and Donut by Content Office.webp |imagecaption=Art by u/Content_Office_2479, Reddit |type= |keywords= |effects= |source= |buy= |sell= }}{{Quote | quote = “Don’t worry, it’s tiny. It’s just below your left eye. Barely noticeable. Like a teardrop tattoo, but smaller. It’s almost like a freckle. What is it? It looks like a gecko foot. It’s cute.” Katia Grim }}
name: Extinction Sigil Tattoo
rules_text: It looks like a gecko foot.
